name: The Theiving Road
description:
_____________________

Feast your eyes on loot. You are Cody, an adventurer from a far off land.

He believes he is the greatest thief on the earth, and it is up to you to make it his rightful position.

This is a joke video game and isn't meant to encourage stealing. Please: DON'T! It's just storytelling. Also, Cody, don't get upset please.

Also, the game has additional content.

Where the game was born:

___________________________________

Yes, this is a fan fic video game of Savedex gaming, Indie Game Pulse, Indie Gaming Guild, I love Indies and Yes_David parties on both YouTube and twitch.

->Don't pay money for this please, because this is just my first official game without too many tutorials (and in PowerPoint!)

Publishing my book?

___________________________________

Yes, I'm still a writer. I enjoy gamedev but my book is also pretty important.
